channel.title: 🚨 Early Pump Signals (Unfiltered Reddit Alerts)
channel.description: Early mentions of stocks matching pump criteria (Robinhood, volume surge, Reddit buzz)

item.title: 🟢 Early Reddit Buzz Detected
item.description: One or more tickers triggered early-stage pump indicators. Check Reddit or your screener now.

item.title: ⚠️ Potential PUMP Alert – Unverified Ticker Activity
item.description: Detected spike in posts or volume matching early pump profile. Review your shortlist manually.
